attributes.description: Policy to allow EKS pods to access MySQL database secrets
attributes.name: tier3-db-secrets-access-policy

attributes.description: KMS key for DB secrets encryption
ECR 저장소에 대한 접근 권한 정책
attributes.name: tier3-ecr-access-policy

attributes.description: Security group for application tier - Controls traffic to/from application servers and containers

egress.description: Allow all outbound traffic - Required for database connections and external API calls

ingress.description: Allow internal communication between application components - Required for microservices
Allow traffic from web tier to application servers - Required for web-to-app communication

attributes.name: SG_app_tier3

attributes.description: Security group for database tier - Controls traffic to/from database servers

egress.description: Allow all outbound traffic - Required for software updates and patch management

ingress.description: Allow MySQL traffic from application tier - Required for app-to-database communication
Allow database replication traffic - Required for high availability setup

attributes.name: SG_db_tier3

attributes.description: Security group for web tier - Controls traffic to/from web servers and load balancers

egress.description: Allow all outbound traffic - Required for software updates and external API calls

ingress.description: Allow HTTP traffic from internet - Required for web access
Allow HTTPS traffic from internet - Required for secure web access

attributes.name: SG_web_tier3
